question: Which joint military exercise was recently concluded by Nepal and India?
explanation: Surya Kiran is an annual bilateral military exercise between India and Nepal. It is conducted in alternative basis. This year it was held in Salijhandi of Rupendehi district of Nepal. Its aim is to conduct battalion-level combined training to increase interoperability in jungle warfare and counter-terrorist operations in mountainous terrain, humanitarian assistance, disaster relief, medical and environmental conservation.
